markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Saboteur's Friend](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1928)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 50 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 14 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The euphemistically named saboteur's friend looks, smells, and tastes like an appetizing chocolate square. You lace the chocolate with reagents that induce a strong laxative effect. Saboteur's friend is useful for incapacitating rather than dealing lasting harm. Unlike some poisons, saboteur's friend can have its sickened condition reduced (but changing to a higher or lower stage after a save applies any sickened condition listed for that stage, as normal).

 **Saving Throw** DC 20 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 1 hour; **Stage 1** [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (10 minutes); **Stage 2** [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) and sickened 2 (10 minutes); **Stage 3** enfeebled 1, [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), and sickened 3 (10 minutes)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Saboteur's Friend
